content.question: If <math alttext="y equals, the fraction with numerator x cubed, and denominator x plus 2, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator negative 2 times x cubed, minus 6 times x squared, and denominator, open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 times x cubed, plus 6 times x squared, and denominator, open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 4 times x cubed, plus 6 times x squared, and denominator, open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 times x cubed, plus 6 times x squared, and denominator, open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
